title: Open Source Contribution Workflow
description: Complete workflow for contributing to an open source project on GitHub

steps.description: Fork the target repository to your account
steps.technical_detail: Creates a fork without cloning, allowing you to clone from your fork later

steps.expected_output:
Cloning into 'vscode'...
remote: Enumerating objects: 150000, done.
✓ Repository cloned to vscode/
steps.technical_detail: Uses GitHub CLI to clone with proper authentication and upstream configuration

steps.description: Create a feature branch for the contribution
steps.technical_detail: Feature branches keep changes isolated and make PR management easier

steps.description: Make code changes and stage them
steps.command: echo 'Fix typo in README.md' > changes.txt && git add README.md
steps.technical_detail: Stage only the files relevant to this specific fix

steps.command: git commit -m 'docs: fix typo in installation instructions'
steps.expected_output:
[fix-typo-readme abc1234] docs: fix typo in installation instructions
 1 file changed, 1 insertion(+), 1 deletion(-)
steps.technical_detail: Follow conventional commit format for clear change history

steps.description: Push the feature branch to your fork
steps.expected_output:
Enumerating objects: 5, done.
To github.com:user/vscode.git
 * [new branch]      fix-typo-readme -> fix-typo-readme
steps.technical_detail: The -u flag sets upstream tracking for future pushes

steps.description: Create a pull request to the upstream repository
steps.command: gh pr create --title 'Fix typo in README installation section' --body 'Corrects spelling mistake in installation instructions' --base main --head user:fix-typo-readme
steps.expected_output:
Creating pull request for user:fix-typo-readme into main in microsoft/vscode
https://github.com/microsoft/vscode/pull/12345
✓ Pull request created
steps.technical_detail: Specifies the head as user:branch for cross-repository PRs

steps.description: Monitor PR status and CI checks
steps.technical_detail: JSON output shows CI status and review state for automation

steps.description: Respond to review feedback with additional commits
steps.command: git commit -am 'Apply review suggestions' && git push
steps.expected_output:
[fix-typo-readme def5678] Apply review suggestions
To github.com:user/vscode.git
   abc1234..def5678  fix-typo-readme -> fix-typo-readme
steps.technical_detail: Additional commits automatically update the existing PR

steps.description: View merged PR and delete feature branch
steps.command: gh pr view 12345 --json state,mergedAt && git branch -d fix-typo-readme
steps.technical_detail: Clean up local branches after successful merge to keep workspace tidy

impact: Successfully contributed documentation fix to major open source project, demonstrating proper GitHub collaboration workflow
